channel.title: Line on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Line
item.description: Well, I’ve got The world in my eyes and The Universe in my Heart I’m not sure where to start Maybe with you. We’ll ride the blue Break the clear Ride the clear Run the fear Be the fear In your presence The choice is clear I’m your terrorist I’m your hero I’m the everything You don’t know I’m the terrorist I’m the hero There’s no telling The seed I sow

item.title: Line
item.description: Sting serpentine ritual High accord She sung to me Her song. I uh just form here. And then. Magic happen. In this space. Where we were once. Proud and Independent. Without the aid of others. Spiral happenstance. A dance. Mm. Wings unfurl. On the outset.-ide. Oh, you want me to finish this sentence? Well, I have been known to plow forth. To break the seal Of a sacrifice. Itâ€™s a big deal.
